description.en:
GOBLIN is a token available on Arbitrum. The protocol offers 3 distinct products: The GOBLIN token, a staking dashboard and a yield tracker token (INGOT). It is inspired by the golden age of staking with a high-speed / low-fees approach.

Both the token purchases and sells are not taxed by the contract. Additionally, the staking platform offers high-APY staking with 0 entry and exit fee (stake / unstake).

GOBLIN is a fork of OHM/Wonderland, with modifications to supply, liquidity, and APY rate.
